title: Instagram Reel Cropper
subtitle: Transform any image into the perfect Instagram Reel format
description: Upload your image and get a professionally cropped vertical image optimized for Instagram Reels. Our AI-powered tool automatically adjusts dimensions and enhances your content for maximum engagement.

features.description: AI-powered cropping that preserves the most important parts of your image

features.title: Perfect Dimensions
features.description: Automatically converts to Instagram Reel's optimal 9:16 aspect ratio

features.title: Instant Processing
features.description: Get your cropped image in seconds with our lightning-fast backend

features.title: High Quality
features.description: Maintains image quality while optimizing for mobile viewing

upload.title: Upload Your Image
